game.name: TINFISH SOLITAIRE
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Adjustable Text Size, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Touch Only Option, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: strategic deck-building solitaire where you place fish on a grid to build combos. refine your pool of fish and find a winning strategy
game.shortDescriptionEn: strategic deck-building solitaire where you place fish on a grid to build combos. refine your pool of fish and find a winning strategy
